Review Text: I have no complaints it was not the most fanciest however it met all our needs and the food was so good! Thank you De Rigg, also thank you to staff Michael, and Frances you made our stay even better God bless you all!!

It’s a superb experience.. the rooms where clean a sweet and sound serene environment the customer care where nice. Room service are always on point. If you are looking for a nice time in surulere you should consider this hotel it’s built to you and your family only to enjoy your peace of time

Review Title: Nice and moderate hotel around surulere lagos
Review Text: If you want a quite and nice place where you can easily navigate both the island and mainland in Lagos, then this hotel is just a perfect location for you. The location is good and secure and the cost is moderate. They offer both continental and Africa dish. The Nigeria disk have good taste and at avoidable price. The generator set is far from room area and you will not get disturb by generator noise. The room and toilet are well maintain

Wonderful hotel decorated with taste, you fell like being home. Very nice and professiional staff and the manager Samuel is the BEST !  Don't hesitate to go to the Bar lounge even if you are not a resident. Very comfortable and cosy place

Been visiting for the past 4 years and it's good to know that the high customer service standard has not changed at all. The staff are friendly and the environment is clean and serene. Food from the restaurant is tasty too. Overall good value for money

The hotel is hidden with no sigh post making it difficult to locate, the lounge is small and the parking space was limited, on many occasion i parked outside.The security was ok. The breakfast was served in the room  promptly..the food price is moderate but not good.
Room Tips: first floor rooms are okay expect Sunday devotion interruption

Review Text: I stayed here in May/June 2016 and Maureen at desk and the housekeeping were accommodating and friendly. My room especially the bathrm was very clean, no mold or smells. The bed is ultra firm making for a solid sleep. I had the room on the 1rst floor in the front- noisiest but bearable, Their free Wifi is not strong, you have to keep signing in as it keeps dropping, same for the tv. The bar and kitchen in the back is popular esp after 5pm with the locals. You can order rm service. the menu rotates as they run out of things. but the red stew and their breakfasts are generous
Room Tips: front of hotel rooms are the noisiest, with the Evening drinking crowd and generators.

Review Text: My second visit to this hotel and everything looks even better than the first time. The beautiful hallway, the neat and classy rooms, the timeless architecture of the bar and restaurant and the ever courteous staff puts this hotel in a class of its own. I was proud to recommend this hotel to my friends coming into Nigeria and staying in Surulere.
Room Tips: The rooms upstairs have better privacy.
